column1: Funeral services will be held at 1:00 P.M. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at the Collier Funeral Home in Louisiana
column4: Missouri. The Rev. Alvin Young assisted by the Rev. Bill Maupin will officiate. Visitation will be held from 10:00 A.M. until time of service at 1:00 P.M. at the funeral home Tuesday
column5: June 16th. Burial will be in the Fairview Cemetery near Louisiana.
